Category.description: Text that categorizes the label, limited to 255 characters. Separate each category with a comma. This field can be used in filter criteria when creating custom label list views.

IsProtected.description: Indicates whether the custom label is protected (true) or not (false). The default value is false .

Language.description: The language of the custom label. Note You canâ€™t change the language of an existing custom label.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package: beta deleted deprecated deprecatedEditable installed installedEditable released unmanaged

MasterLabel.description: An easily recognizable internal label to identify this custom label. This description is used in merge fields and is not translated.

Name.description: The name used in Apex and Visualforce pages to reference the custom label. Names must contain only alphanumeric characters, start with a letter, contain no spaces or double underscores, and be unique from all other labels in your org.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace of the package of which the custom label is a part.

Value.description: The custom label value, limited to 1,000 characters. This value can be translated into any language that Salesforce supports.
